description: Mobile communications vehicle. For shipping to QETE Ottawa, delivery in 120 days.
tags: Preferred administrative language is English, but both English and French accepted
full_summary:
==============================================

**Mobile Communications Vehicle Tender Announcement**
---------------------------------------------------------

### Reference Number and Solicitation Number

* Reference Number: PW-22-01012332
* Solicitation Number: W8476-226506/C

### Tender Details

* Bid Type: Request for Proposal
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open bidding
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Solicitation Status: Expired

### Project Description

The Department of National Defence requires the procurement of 1 mobile communications vehicle for delivery to QETE, Ottawa, Ontario. The requested delivery date is 120 days after contract award.

### Technical Specifications

* GSN: N2320 - Trucks and Truck Tractors, Wheeled
* UNSPSC: Not specified

### Tender Closing Date

* Tender Closing Date: 2023-01-17T14:00:00

### Trade Agreements

* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

### Contact Information

* Name: James, Brian
* Email: brian.james3@forces.gc.ca
* Phone: 819-939-3299
* Address: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2
